cause.description:
okay..this is it...document your daily random acts of kindness..doesn't have to be big..open the door for someone...offer to carry someones groceries..dont' be rude when you want to be..or..do something major..either way..tell us about it......be a "deeder" ...it does a body good !!! lol
1. we are only as good as what we do for others
2. remember the golden rule
3. keep it simple and smile for frig sakes !!
cause.name: RANDOM ACTS OF KINDNESS
